name: You Died As You Lived
description:
"YOU DIED AS YOU LIVED"

Eat a thing. Make a friend.

Take a chance. Do it again.

And again...

And again...

And again...

Life as a cycle of rituals. Press SPACE to live.

CREDITS
Art: Korbin Shuffleton, Matthew Solander
Audio: Bjorn Shen, Dan Thompson
Code: Adam Cardoza, Kevin Cavanaugh, Chris Foster

Created in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2016
